name: blockchain_app_response
description: Response schema for blockchain app assistant interactions

response_type.description: Type of response - chat for conversation, view_call for read operations, write_call for transactions

message.description: Human-readable message to display to the user

contract_call.description: Contract method call details (required for view_call and write_call)

contract.description: Name of the contract to call (must match app config)

method.description: Name of the contract method to call

explanation.description: Human-readable explanation of what this contract call does
